about.title: About Me
about.name: Vazgen Arutyunyan
description: My journey in IT began in 2017 when I first immersed myself in programming by learning C++ based on expert recommendations. Since then, I have been actively developing in web development, mastering technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript with jQuery, Bootstrap 4/5, Node.js, Git, PHP, and Vue.js.

For the past three years, I have focused on cross-platform application development using Flutter and the Dart programming language. This direction has allowed me to create efficient and modern applications that work across various platforms.

My goal is to create quality digital solutions that meet modern requirements and help my clients achieve their goals. With each project, I continue to expand my knowledge and skills, staying at the forefront of technology.

services.title: We can provide you with services such as:
list: Website layout according to the provided design
Full-fledged website with conceptual design and prototype
Video editing and processing of various complexity levels
Custom logo design that sticks in memory
Cross-platform apps for iOS, Android, and Web

overweb.title: OverWeb
overweb.description: OverWeb is my personal project, which I am developing together with a team of like-minded people. We create comprehensive solutions for web and mobile applications. Each member of our team is a specialist in their field: designers, developers, and video editors. Together, we combine our efforts to achieve the best results in every project.
